root_causes.description: High volume of AR exceptions indicates potential data entry errors or system integration issues leading to inaccurate accounts receivable records.
Bank duplicates suggest inadequate reconciliation processes, leading to duplicate entries in financial records.

remediations.action: Implement enhanced validation rules for AR data entry and conduct regular audits to ensure accuracy.
remediations.estimated_effort: 2 weeks of dedicated data quality team effort
remediations.success_criteria: Reduction in AR exceptions by 80% within the next quarter.

remediations.action: Revise bank reconciliation processes to include duplicate detection mechanisms and regular review cycles.
remediations.estimated_effort: 1 month of process improvement team effort
remediations.success_criteria: Elimination of duplicate entries in bank reconciliations within two months.
